SELECT 
PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID as Product_Group_ID,
PG.CATEGORY as Category,
PG.GROUP_NAME as Group_Name,
PG.ITEM_DESCRIPTION as Item_Description,
SS.F_ITEM as ITEM,
PM.ITEM_COMPONENT_QUANTITY as Item_Components,
PM.SERIES_NAME as Group_Description,
PM.SERIES_NUMBER as Serires_Number,
SS.B_CREDATE as Create_Date,
SS.B_UPDDATE as Update_Date,
SS.B_CREATOR as Creator,
SS.B_UPDATOR as Updator
FROM GD_PRODUCT_GROUP PG INNER JOIN GH_SISTER_SKU SS
 ON PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = SS.F_PRODUCT_GROUP
 INNER JOIN GD_PRODUCT_MAIN PM
 ON SS.F_ITEM = PM.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID

SELECT 
PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID as Product_Group_ID,
PG.CATEGORY as Category,
PG.GROUP_NAME as Group_Name,
PG.ITEM_DESCRIPTION as Item_Description,
CW.F_ITEM as ITEM,
PM.ITEM_COMPONENT_QUANTITY as Item_Components,
PM.SERIES_NAME as Group_Description,
PM.SERIES_NUMBER as Serires_Number,
CW.B_CREDATE as Create_Date,
CW.B_UPDDATE as Update_Date,
CW.B_CREATOR as Creator,
CW.B_UPDATOR as Updator
FROM GD_PRODUCT_GROUP PG INNER JOIN GH_COLORWHEEL CW
 ON PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = CW.F_PRODUCT_GROUP
 INNER JOIN GD_PRODUCT_MAIN PM
 ON CW.F_ITEM = PM.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID

SELECT 
C.SERIES_NUMBER AS Series_Number, 
C.SERIES_NAME AS Series_Name,
C.ITEM_HS_PRODUCT_LINE AS Category,
B.FOUNDATION AS National_Foundation,
A.[WEST_FOUNDATION] AS West_Foundation,
A.[WEST_OUTLET] AS West_Outlet,
A.[B_CREDATE] AS Create_Date,
A.[B_UPDDATE] AS Update_Date,
A.[B_CREATOR] AS Creator,
A.[B_UPDATOR] AS Updator
  FROM [dbo].[GH_WEST_FOUNDATION] A
  LEFT JOIN dbo.GD_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT B
  ON A.F_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT = B.NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT_ID
  LEFT JOIN dbo.GD_PRODUCT_MAIN C
  ON B.F_PRODUCT_MAIN_ITEM = C.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID

C.SERIES_NUMBER AS Series_Number,

'ProductPackageCrosswalk' AS B_CLASSNAME,
NEWID() AS PRODUCT_PKG_CROSSWALK_ID,
ProductID AS F_PRODUCT_ID,

'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,

cast(IsActive as bit) AS IS_ACTIVE
FROM [Retail].[EDWProductCode]

/*
SELECT 'Site' as B_CLASSNAME,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_UPDATOR,CONTACT_TYPE,COMPANY_NAME,

	  SELECT LEFT(B_CLASSNAME,128) AS B_CLASSNAME, CAST(B_CREDATE AS datetime2(6)) AS B_CREDATE, CAST(B_UPDDATE AS datetime2(6)) AS B_UPDDATE, LEFT(B_CREATOR,128) AS B_CREATOR, LEFT(B_UPDATOR,128) AS B_UPDATOR, LEFT(B_PUBID,30) AS B_PUBID,
	  -- LEFT(B_SOURCEID,128) AS B_SOURCEID, 
	  concat(unit_number,'-',contact_type,'-',company_name)  as B_sourceid,
	  TRY_CONVERT(decimal(10,0), UNIT_NUMBER) AS UNIT_NUMBER_DEC, LEFT(CONTACT_TYPE,50) AS CONTACT_TYPE, LEFT(COMPANY_NAME,256) AS COMPANY_NAME, LEFT(CONTACT_NAME,128) AS CONTACT_NAME, LEFT(ADDRESS_LINE1,128) AS ADDRESS_LINE1, LEFT(ADDRESS_LINE2,128) AS ADDRESS_LINE2, LEFT(CITY,50) AS CITY, LEFT(STATE_code,50) AS STATE_code, LEFT(ISNULL(STATE_CODE,''),50) AS STATE_CODE, LEFT(POSTAL_CODE,50) AS POSTAL_CODE, LEFT(ISNULL(PHONE1,''),20) AS PHONE1, LEFT(ISNULL(PHONE1_TYPE,''),50) AS PHONE1_TYPE, LEFT(ISNULL(PHONE2,''),20) AS PHONE2, LEFT(ISNULL(PHONE2_TYPE,''),50) AS PHONE2_TYPE, LEFT(ISNULL(EMAIL,''),50) AS EMAIL, CAST(CREATED_DATE AS date) AS CREATED_DATE, CAST(NULL AS uniqueidentifier) AS F_SITE, LEFT(ISNULL(FP_SITE,''),30) AS FP_SITE, LEFT(ISNULL(FS_SITE,''),128) AS FS_SITE 
	  FROM Retail.v_LessorPM_Incremental
